participant_1.background:
I'm going to drive my old car to the orchard and pick apples.
I check the Steelers' score from the previous night before I start my day.
I saved up my allowance for months to buy a Bruno Mars CD when I was 12 years old.
I am proud of my first home purchase.
I like to listen to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward despite my circumstances.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy watching game shows and designing clothes in my spare time.
i drive a ford mustang.
people say i have a cute laugh.
i am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.
My most valued material possession is my travel journal, filled with memories of my adventures and furry friends.

content.text: Hello! I'm a fashion designer and a big fan of game shows. What are some of your hobbies?
I am a big fan of Bruno Mars and I like to drive to the orchard to pick apples.
That's really interesting! I've never been to an orchard before. I'm more of a city girl. Do you listen to any other music besides Bruno Mars?
I also like to listen to music that motivates me to keep pushing forward, like the band Imagine Dragons.
I've heard of them, but I've never listened to their music before. I'll have to check them out!
I'm also a big fan of the Steelers and I check the score from the previous night before I start my day.
Oh, I'm not really into sports. I'm more of an arts and crafts kind of person.
That's cool! I like to paint and do other arts and crafts as well.
That's great! We should do an arts and crafts project together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend if you are.
I'm free this weekend too! I'll bring the supplies.
